official_title: To delay the effectiveness of penalties for failure to comply with section 2110(b) of title 46, United States Code, relating to fees and charges for recreational vessels.

summary.text: Prohibits subjecting a person to a penalty for failure to pay, before October 31, 1991, a specified fee or charge on recreational vessels over 16 feet long.

titles.title: To delay the effectiveness of penalties for failure to comply with section 2110(b) of title 46, United States Code, relating to fees and charges for recreational vessels.
